tool_description: Amazon product results for a specific key
name: Smart amazon scraper
title: Smart amazon scraper

api_list.name: products
api_list.description: get products by country and productId

required_parameters.name: nation
required_parameters.description:
use:

it - Italy
com - US
fr - France
jp - Japan

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://smart-amazon-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/products/it/Guitar"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "smart-amazon-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://smart-amazon-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/products/{nation}/{product}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "smart-amazon-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
